		Perform your cuts the mustard test.

  <script>
		var cutsTheMustard = ('querySelector' in document && 'localStorage' in window && 'addEventListener' in window);
		var transparentMenu = false
		if (cutsTheMustard) {
			// Swap the `core` class on the HTML element for an `enhanced` one
			// We're doing it early in the head to avoid a flash of unstyled content
			document.documentElement.className = document.documentElement.className.replace(/\bcore\b/g, 'enhanced');
		}
	</script>

            font-size: 16px!important;
        }
        input.topbar_search_box:focus {
            outline: 0;
        }*/

        .o-header__search-term:focus {
            border: none;
        }

        .search_result_dropdown {
            position: absolute;
            top: 32px;
            left: -1px;
            width: calc(100% + 2px);
            background: white;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            border-left: 1px solid #cec6b9;
            border-right: 1px solid #cec6b9;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #cec6b9;
            z-index: 99999;
        }

        .search_result_dropdown ul {
            list-style: none;
            padding-left: 3px;
            padding-right: 3px;
            margin: 0px;
            text-align: left;
        }
        .search_result_dropdown ul li {
            border-top: 1px solid #cec6b9;
            color: #d66d06;
            padding-top: 8px;
            padding-bottom: 8px;
            padding-left: 7px;
            font-family: MetricWeb,sans-serif;
            font-weight: 400!important;
            font-size: 14px!important;
        }
        .search_result_dropdown ul li a {
            color: #26747a;
            text-decoration: none;
        }

        .search_result_dropdown ul li span.highlight {
            font-weight: 600!important;
        }

        .search_result_dropdown ul li.last,
        .search_result_dropdown ul li.last a {
            color: #333333;
        }

        .search_result_dropdown {
            display: none;
        }
    </style> 
  <style media="screen">
    .o-header--sticky {
        -webkit-transform: translateY(0%);
        -ms-transform: translateY(0%);
        transform: translateY(0%);
        top: -80px;
        transition: none !important;
        position: fixed;
    }

    .o-header {
        transition: background-color 0.5s ease;
    }
    .o-header__subnav {
        transition: background-color 0.5s ease;
    }

    .o-header--sticky .o-header__search[aria-hidden="false"] {
        display: none;
    }
    .o-header--sticky.is-active .o-header__search[aria-hidden="false"]{
        display: block;
    }

    @media (max-width:979px) {
        .o-header--sticky.is-active .o-header__search[aria-hidden="false"] {
            display: none;
        }
    }

    .o-header--sticky .o-share {
        display: none;
    }
    .o-header--sticky.is-active .o-share {
        display: inline-block;
    }
</style>

    var isIE9lower=false

  <!--[if lte IE 9]>
    <script type="text/javascript">
    isIE9lower=true
    </script>
    <![endif]--> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
    var isIE10 = false;
    /*@cc_on
        if (/^10/.test(@_jscript_version)) {
            isIE10 = true;
        }
    @*/
    </script> 
  <script type="text/javascript">
	var waitForFinalEvent = (function () {
	  var timers = {};
	  return function (callback, ms, uniqueId) {
	    if (!uniqueId) {
	      uniqueId = "Don't call this twice without a uniqueId";
	    }
	    if (timers[uniqueId]) {
	      clearTimeout (timers[uniqueId]);
	    }
	    timers[uniqueId] = setTimeout(callback, ms);
	  };
	})();
    function iOSversion() {
        if (/iP(hone|od|ad)/.test(navigator.platform)) {
            // supports iOS 2.0 and later: <http://bit.ly/TJjs1V>
            var v = (navigator.appVersion).match(/OS (\d+)_(\d+)_?(\d+)?/);
            return [parseInt(v[1], 10), parseInt(v[2], 10), parseInt(v[3] || 0, 10)];
        }
    }
    var iOS = /iPad|iPhone|iPod/.test(navigator.userAgent) && !window.MSStream;
    var isIE11 = !!window.MSInputMethodContext && !!document.documentMode;
    var ua = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
    var isSamsungBrowser = navigator.userAgent.match(/SamsungBrowser/i)
    var isSamsungBrowserEnhanced = navigator.userAgent.match(/SamsungBrowser\/4/i) || navigator.userAgent.match(/SamsungBrowser\/5/i)
    var isAndroid = isSamsungBrowser || ua.indexOf("android") > -1; //&& ua.indexOf("mobile");
    var isEdge = (/Edge\/\d./i.test(navigator.userAgent))
    var isMobileIE = navigator.userAgent.match(/Windows Phone/i) || navigator.userAgent.match(/iemobile/i) || navigator.userAgent.match(/WPDesktop/i)
    var cutsTheMustard = ('querySelector' in document && 'localStorage' in window && 'addEventListener' in window);
    try {
        var iOSver = iOSversion();
        var iOSCore = iOS && iOSver[0] <= 7
    } catch (e) {
        console.log("iOS detection failed, assuming latest" + e)
        var iOSver = 10
        var iOSCore = false
    }

    var enhancedExperience = !isIE10 && cutsTheMustard && !isIE9lower && !iOSCore && !(isSamsungBrowser && !isSamsungBrowserEnhanced)

    var isAndroid4 = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Android 4") > -1) && (navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Version/4.") > -1)

	//
    // (function(src) {
    //     if (cutsTheMustard) {
    //         var o = document.createElement('script');
    //         o.async = o.defer = true;
    //         o.src = src;
    //         var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    //         s.parentNode.insertBefore(o, s);
    //     }
    // }('/static/js/bundle.js'));
</script>

  <div class="o-grid-container o-grid-container--hero-image"> 
   <div class="o-grid-row"> 
    <div class="hero"> 
     <div data-o-grid-colspan="12 S12 M12"> 
      <div class="hero-image hero-image-10406">

  <!-- Start: Main Content --> 
  <div class="placeholder_content"> 
   <div class="o-grid-row"> 
    <div data-o-grid-colspan="12 S12 M12"> 
     <h1 class="o-typography-heading1 section__title" style="text-align:center;"> FT Editorial Code </h1> 
    </div> 
   </div> 
   <div class="o-grid-container cms_typography"> 
    <h2>Our commitment</h2> 
    <p>It is fundamental to the integrity and success of the Financial Times (FT) that we uphold the highest possible standards of ethical and professional journalism, and that we are seen to do so.</p> 
    <p>The benchmark for the FT’s journalistic practices is set by our <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/7f/55/7f55e593-0e9c-447e-8945-89ee919553eb/editorial_code_of_practice.pdf" target="_blank">FT Editorial Code</a>. Compliance with the code is an obligation for all FT editorial staff.</p> 
    <hr> 
    <h2>Our actions</h2> 
    <p>If you wish to request a clarification or correction, please email <a href="mailto:corrections@ft.com">corrections@ft.com</a>.</p> 
    <p>If you wish to make a complaint about any of our editorial content or journalistic activity, please contact &nbsp;<a target="_blank" href="https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&amp;fs=1&amp;tf=1&amp;to=editor@ft.com">editor@ft.com</a>.</p> 
    <p>Where any complaint under the <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/7f/55/7f55e593-0e9c-447e-8945-89ee919553eb/editorial_code_of_practice.pdf" target="_blank">FT Editorial Code</a> is unable to be resolved by FT’s senior editors, the <a href="/en-gb/ft-editorial-code/greg-callus/">Complaints Commissioner</a> will review the matter and recommend any appropriate redress.</p> 
    <p>In September 2014 the Financial Times Limited (FT) appointed Greg Callus as its editorial Complaints Commissioner. The role will ensure a continued means of dealing with reader complaints following the closure of the UK Press Complaints Commission. His remit is to support the FT’s existing framework for handling editorial complaints, independent of the editor.</p> 
    <p>Read more about the role <a href="/en-gb/ft-editorial-code/update-independent-system-editorial-complaints/">here</a>.</p> 
    <p>Find out more about the <a href="/en-gb/ft-editorial-code/greg-callus/">Complaints Commissioner</a> and the <a href="/en-gb/ft-editorial-code/appointments-oversight-committee/">Appointments and Oversight Committee</a>.</p> 
    <p>Read our guide to the policies and processes of the Complaints Commissioner <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/31/c8/31c8f888-7e54-42f5-88e7-1c06e7a7d12e/editorial-complaints-guidance.pdf" target="_blank">here</a>.</p> 
    <p>&nbsp;</p> 
    <h3>Adjudicated complaints</h3> 
    <p><a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/b7/bc/b7bc0379-6acd-4fdd-b3e9-98ca06c585e2/tierno_adjudication_final.pdf">15 February 2018, Paul Tierno</a>. Breach, Article 7(2)<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/70/a7/70a7d4b1-2b77-46f8-bab4-92afc594d129/cheung_adjudication.pdf">22 January 2018, Peter Cheung</a>. No breach, Clause 1.1.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/32/c8/32c86574-c6da-4c49-8c35-ae8ed4434b6f/ellie_bennett_adjudication.pdf">7 December 2017, Ellie Bennett.</a> No breach, Clause 1.1 or 1.2.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/c9/71/c971ea46-1c8d-47f4-940c-8132b412c7fe/wessendorff_adjudication.pdf">31 October 2017, Alex Wessendorff.</a>&nbsp;No breach, Clause 1.1 or 1.2.&nbsp;<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/ba/e7/bae7424a-140a-4fa1-9488-1b4c25aedaa8/whatling_adjudication.pdf">8 August 2017, Shaun Whatling</a>. No breach, Clause 1.2.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/cb/29/cb295691-da0a-494a-bcd2-e3ba49452325/leci_ii_adjudication.pdf">16 June&nbsp;2017, Dr Colin Leci</a>. No breach, Clause 1.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/e1/a6/e1a630cb-d52a-4f2b-a15c-903e7a65306b/2016-07-01_kay-adjudication.pdf" target="_blank">6 August 2016, Anthony Kay</a>. No breach, Clause 12.1.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/60/d1/60d1f190-f80a-4f6b-a29a-5f0e89f9eca2/2016-05-24_stanley-adjudication.pdf" target="_blank">24 May 2016, Paul Stanley</a>. No breach.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/8f/a2/8fa20a21-fba3-45f9-b7bc-f701aba50be3/2016-03-22_jordan-jay-adjudication.pdf" target="_blank">14 April 2016, Jordan Jay</a>. No breach.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/d1/df/d1dfd469-a622-40fd-87fc-bbf2123597c2/2016-02-26_gifted-deposit-adjudication.pdf" target="_blank">14 April 2016, Owen Angel and Paul Lamm</a>. No breach.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/9d/5f/9d5f606f-a91f-4013-a3d2-a5a3aab16dbe/2015-11-04_leci-adjudications.pdf" target="_blank">6 January 2016, Dr Colin L. Leci</a>. No breach.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/84/45/844565b9-07f9-457e-902a-59f2cb220971/2015-06-29_adjudication-bartlett.pdf" target="_blank">29 June 2015, Robert Bartlett</a>. No breach.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/60/9f/609fb246-1319-4841-8d2f-a7a9b2c5ee2f/2015-05-11_ferguson-adjudication-with-ps.pdf" target="_blank">29 May 2015, Jonathan Portes</a>. Complaint partially upheld under Clause 1.2.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/75/99/75999bef-ec3c-480a-a314-8f7939bd356a/2015-02-27_jp-rathbone-adjudication-edited.pdf" target="_blank">18 June 2015, Dr Bia Labate</a>. No breach of articles 1(2) and 1(4). Article in question <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/04/3a/043a2e0c-f666-4f4e-b399-ecef8ed43f4f/2015-02-27_appendix-a-john-paul-rathbone.pdf" target="_blank">here</a>.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/de/e2/dee28af0-d416-48d9-a9fa-624f8b2e5215/2015-02-17_pa-final-adjudication.pdf" target="_blank">1 March 2015, PA</a>. No breach of Clause 3.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/23/9c/239c42ce-b109-4d8c-a6fa-800c7f81ea11/2015-01-29_adjudication-snp-mansion-tax.pdf">25 February, Andrew Anderson</a>. No breach, Clause 1.<br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/aa/27/aa27c09e-86e3-45f6-b063-ed809df43f00/2015-01-28_matt-berkley-adjudication.pdf">29 March 2015, Matt Berkley</a>. No breach, Clause 1 or 1.2.</p> 
    <h3>Quarterly summaries</h3> 
    <p><a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/df/74/df74eaed-c9ca-4105-b421-7650987435c2/summary_q3_2017.pdf">Q3&nbsp;2017&nbsp;Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a><br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/36/97/36979817-ea8c-4cf1-8af7-1bd0f1cdb0de/summary_q2_2017.pdf">Q2 2017&nbsp;Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a><br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/14/8c/148cc210-ef5a-4c6b-84ff-92db3ea721cb/summary_q1_2017.pdf">Q1 2017&nbsp;Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a><br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/0c/7d/0c7d4027-a104-4e86-8b88-6991c82061e9/summary_q4_2016.pdf">Q4 2016 Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a><br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/95/8f/958fcb46-bf73-41a3-a6ce-4c25ae41b632/summary_q2_2016__q3_2016.pdf">Q2 &amp; Q3 2016&nbsp;Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a><br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/05/4b/054b7ed1-86b9-4dc7-98fc-76a5197e6295/summary_q1_2016.pdf">Q1 2016 Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a><br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/63/4c/634cbdbe-33f6-450c-b5de-c64d629a1606/ft-quarterly-report-q4-2015.pdf" target="_blank">Q4 2015 Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a><br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/de/0f/de0f5dbc-cc37-4d49-a988-036b2930a928/ft-quarterly-report-q3-2015.pdf" target="_blank">Q3 2015 Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a><br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/e2/1d/e21d1e7c-4d8f-4c03-85ba-b42730c7e9b8/third-precis-q2-2015.pdf" target="_blank">Q2 2015 Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a><br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/18/a6/18a6d8de-a857-4c2f-961d-9031c6756282/ecc-precis-q1-2015.pdf" target="_blank">Q1 2015 Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a><br> <a href="https://ft1105aboutft-live-14d4b9c72ce6450cb685-1b1cc38.aldryn-media.io/filer_public/70/37/7037db3d-f098-4645-a6a7-8a7be84ee469/ecc-precis-q4-2014.pdf" target="_blank">Q4 2014 Editorial Complaints Commissioner report summary</a></p>

function getStyle($el){var style=getComputedStyle($el).fontFamily,parsed=null,props={};while((parsed=propRegex.exec(style))!==null){props[parsed[1]]=parsed[2];}
if(props['object-position'])

function initialize(){var videos=document.querySelectorAll('video'),index=-1;while(videos[++index]){var style=getStyle(videos[index]);if(style['object-fit']||style['object-position']){style['object-fit']=style['object-fit']||'fill';fitIt(videos[index],style);}}}
function fitIt($el,style){if(style['object-fit']==='fill')
return;var setCss=$el.style,getCss=window.getComputedStyle($el);var $wrap=document.createElement('object-fit');$wrap.appendChild($el.parentNode.replaceChild($wrap,$el));var wrapCss={height:'100%',width:'100%',boxSizing:'content-box',display:'inline-block',overflow:'hidden'};'backgroundColor backgroundImage borderColor borderStyle borderWidth bottom fontSize lineHeight left opacity margin position right top visibility'.replace(/\w+/g,function(key){wrapCss[key]=getCss[key];});for(var key in wrapCss)

$($el).attr("wasresized",true)}}
function parsePosition(style){if(~style['object-position'].indexOf('left'))
style['object-position-x']='left';else if(~style['object-position'].indexOf('right'))
style['object-position-x']='right';else
style['object-position-x']='center';if(~style['object-position'].indexOf('top'))
style['object-position-y']='top';else if(~style['object-position'].indexOf('bottom'))
style['object-position-y']='bottom';else
style['object-position-y']='center';return style;}
